title: Renewable Energy-Based Contextual STEM Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts (energy, physics) and understanding of simple engineering design
context.additional_context: Providing renewable energy system design and experimental environments using VR/simulation tools. Strengthening STEM application abilities in real-world contexts through team-based problem-solving activities

learning_goals: Can explain the scientific principles of renewable energy technologies (solar, wind, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Can create a renewable energy system model in a VR environment by applying the engineering design process
Can design and present solutions to regional energy problems through team collaboration
Demonstrates creative problem-solving skills improved by over 15% based on the Scientific Creativity Scale (SCS)
Shows a 20% or greater increase in interest as measured by the STEM Career Interest Survey (STEM-CIS)

resources: Renewable Energy Experiment Kit (Supplementary Teaching Material)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
